actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to authorize testimony by a Senate employee in the case of Tennessee v. Hutchinson, No. 9100652MMACI (General Sessions Court of Knox County) and related cases.

summary.text: Authorizes Keith Hill, and any other employee in Senator Gore's office, to testify in the case of Tennessee v. Hutchinson, and related cases, except concerning matters which may be privileged.

titles.title: A resolution to authorize testimony by a Senate employee in the case of Tennessee v. Hutchinson, No. 9100652MMACI (General Sessions Court of Knox County) and related cases.
